forum.content:
I'm thousands of miles away from you hoping to pacify my heartache with distance. But every where I go, everything I see still reminds me of you. I don't know how much of this I can take.

All those promises you made me swear to you meant nothing to you but they mean everything to me. Then you just threw everything away as if they were nothing. Nothing more than just trash, including me.

You really tore me apart. There's no going back for us. Oh how you made sure of that, so cruelly and easily. Yet, why can't I stop thinking about you.
forum.title: Can't stop the heartache
